page.title: 09Family Business
page.content: Donisthorpe's local Newsagent and General store has been in the same family for 30 years. Opening hours are 5.30am to 6.00pm Monday to Friday, 5.30am to 1pm Saturday and Sunday. We sell newspapers,stationary, cigarettes,sweets,pop and crisps and general provisions.We are also agents for Sketchley Cleaners. We have fresh bread and milk delivered daily.Sweets, cigarettes,pop and crisps are ordered fortnightly.The general goods we get from the cash and carry weekly.We open early to serve the local miners with newspapers and tobacco before they start work. During the week around 8.00am the children going to school call for snacks for their lunch.Sunday mornings we deliver newspapers.We have about 10 newsboys and girls.They deliver around Moira,Donisthorpe and Oakthorpe.
